thread.section_title: webuyanycar.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of webuyanycar.com | webuyanycarusa.com | 3 of 204
thread.title: Jim

author: Jim
title: Jim
text:
From the time we made the appointment to the time we left the office everything was easy and smooth. Tim was professional and polite. He took the time to explain everything. He was a perfect gentleman and actually made my day.
The process was quick and painless. The price was fair, more than we would have gotten on a trade-in. Thank you, Tim, and thank you We Buy Any Car.
